POC decryptor for BlackBasta Ransomware. Requires the RSA private key to decrypt files.

For example:

`python3 blackbasta_decryptor_poc.py --path Eula.txt.basta -n  -d  --debug
BlackBastaDecryptor: Processing path: Eula.txt.basta
BlackBastaDecryptor: Encrypted key blob size: 0x204
BlackBastaDecryptor: Decrypted Chacha params: 0x697f1f886b115c2c5dd849652afa35c9b0b0f82a642b76c03b30be502b9181b4b8043a9f07ab7498
BlackBastaDecryptor: Chacha key: 697f1f886b115c2c5dd849652afa35c9b0b0f82a642b76c03b30be502b9181b4
BlackBastaDecryptor: Chacha nonce: b8043a9f07ab7498
BlackBastaDecryptor: Original filesize: 7005
BlackBastaDecryptor: Saving decrypted file to Eula.txt`
